rulesStrings.li:
questDescription->A friendly AI from your past named <Name>Charlon Whitestone</Name> has sent you a message! 
He reveals that he has a starship hidden on this planet, and sends you its world coordinates. 
The starship is in deep hibernation mode. You'll have to start it up when you arrive, then defend it from raiders trying to steal it until the startup sequence completes. It will be a long, difficult series of battles. 
If you can get the ship off the ground, <Name>Charlon</Name> will take you off this rimworld, to the stars.
